snippet: President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela postponed another procedure to solidify party support for his chosen successor, Vice President Nicolás Maduro.
abstract: Venezuela's Pres Hugo Chavez postpones emergency cancer surgery to return home, meet with his inner circle and solidify party support for his chosen successor, Vice Pres Nicolas Maduro.

byline.contributor: Andrew Rosati contributed reporting from Caracas, Venezuela.

lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela postponed another procedure to solidify party support for his chosen successor, Vice President Nicolás Maduro.

headline.seo: Chávez Put Party Unity Before Another Cancer Surgery
headline.main: Before More Cancer Surgery, Chávez Had Some Political Fences to Mend at Home
headline.print_headline: Before More Cancer Surgery, Chávez Had Some Political Fences to Mend at Home
